00010 ORGretaDecoder::ORGretaDecoder() 
00011 { 
00012   fDataRecord = NULL; 
00013   fBitMask = 0x0;
00014 }
00015 
00016 bool ORGretaDecoder::SetDataRecord(UInt_t* dataRecord) 
00017 {
00018   fDataRecord = dataRecord;
00019 
00020   if ( fBitMask == 0x0 ) {
00021     fBitMask = 0x1;
00022     for( size_t i=1;i<GetBitResolution();i++) {
00023       fBitMask <<= 1; 
00024       fBitMask += 1;
00025     }
00026   }
00027 
00028   ORLog(kDebug) << "SetDataRecord(): Setting the data record..." << std::endl;
00029   if (GetPacketLength() == GetBufHeadLen()) {
00030     ORLog(kDebug) << "SetDataRecord(): There are 0 waveforms in the record." << std::endl;
00031     return true;
00032   }     
00033   if(!IsValid()) {
00034     ORLog(kDebug) << "SetDataRecord(): data record is not valid" << std::endl;
00035     fDataRecord = NULL;
00036     return false;
00037   }
00038   ORLog(kDebug) << "SetDataRecord(): Exiting" << std::endl;
00039   return true;
00040 }

00046 
00047 //copies the waveform data to the array pointed to by
00048 //waveform, which is of length len
00049 size_t ORGretaDecoder::CopyWaveformData(UShort_t* waveform, size_t len)
00050 {
00051   size_t wflen = GetWaveformLen();
00052   if (wflen == 0) return 0;
00053   if ((len < wflen) || (len == 0)) {
00054     ORLog(kWarning) << "CopyWaveformData(): destination array length is " << len 
00055                     << "; waveform data length is " << GetWaveformLen() << std::endl;
00056   }
00057   else len = GetWaveformLen(); 
00058   const UInt_t* waveformData = GetWaveformDataPointer();
00059   // Have to use a bitmask, no memcopy possible given the packed nature of
00060   // the data.
00061   for(size_t i=0;i<len;i+=2) 
00062   {
00063     waveform[i] = (UShort_t) waveformData[i/2] & fBitMask;  
00064     waveform[i+1] = (UShort_t) (waveformData[i/2] & (fBitMask << 16) ) >> 16;
00065   }
00066   return len;
00067 }
00068 
00069 //copies the waveform data to the array pointed to by
00070 //waveform, which is of length len
00071 size_t ORGretaDecoder::CopyWaveformDataDouble(double* waveform, size_t len)
00072 {
00073   size_t wflen = GetWaveformLen();
00074   if (wflen == 0) return 0;
00075   if ((len < wflen) || (len == 0)) {
00076     ORLog(kWarning) << "CopyWaveformData(): destination array length is " << len 
00077                     << "; waveform data length is " << GetWaveformLen() << std::endl;
00078   }
00079   else len = GetWaveformLen(); 
00080   const UInt_t* waveformData = GetWaveformDataPointer();
00081   for(size_t i=0;i<len;i+=2) 
00082   {
00083     waveform[i] = (double) (waveformData[i/2] & fBitMask);  
00084     waveform[i+1] = (double) ((waveformData[i/2] & (fBitMask << 16)) >> 16);
00085   }
00086   return len;
00087 }
00088 
00089 size_t ORGretaDecoder::CopyWaveformDataShort(short* waveform, size_t len)
00090 {
00091   size_t wflen = GetWaveformLen();
00092   if (wflen == 0) return 0;
00093   if ((len < wflen) || (len == 0)) {
00094     ORLog(kWarning) << "CopyWaveformData(): destination array length is " << len
00095                     << "; waveform data length is " << GetWaveformLen() << std::endl;
00096   }
00097   else len = GetWaveformLen();
00098  
00099   memcpy(waveform, GetWaveformDataPointer(), len*sizeof(short));
00100   return len;
00101 }

00199 
00200 bool ORGretaDecoder::IsValid() 
00201 { 
00202   ORLog(kDebug) << "IsValid(): starting... " << std::endl;
00203   if(IsShort(fDataRecord)) { 
00204     ORLog(kError) << "Data file is short" << std::endl; 
00205     return false;
00206   } 
00207   return true;
00208 }
00209 
00210 void ORGretaDecoder::DumpBufferHeader()
00211 {
00212   if(fDataRecord)
00213   {
00214     ORLog(kDebug) << "Dumping Data Buffer Header (Raw Data): " << std::endl;
00215     ORLog(kDebug) << "**************************************************" << std::endl;
00216     for(size_t i=2;i<GetBufHeadLen(); i++)
00217     {
00218       ORLog(kDebug) << fDataRecord[i] << std::endl;
00219     }
00220     ORLog(kDebug) << "**************************************************" << std::endl;
00221   }
00222 }

00228 void ORGretaDecoder::Dump(UInt_t* dataRecord) //debugging 
00229 {
00230   size_t iChannel, iEvent;
00231   
00232   ORLog(kDebug) << std::endl << std::endl << "ORGretaDecoder::Dump():" << std::endl ;
00233   iChannel = 0;
00234   iEvent = 0;
00235   if(!SetDataRecord(dataRecord)) return; 
00236         ORLog(kDebug) 
00237           << "  Header functions: " << std::endl
00238           << "    Crate = " << CrateOf() << "; card = " << CardOf() << std::endl
00239           << "    The buffer is " << GetBufHeadLen() << " (32-bit) words long" << std::endl
00240           << "    The Board Id is " << GetBoardId() << std::endl
00241           << "    The channel is " << GetChannelNum() << std::endl
00242           << "    The packet length is (32-bit words) " << GetPacketLength() 
00243             << std::endl
00244           << "    LED/external Timestamp: " << GetLEDExtTimeStamp() << std::endl
00245           << "    CFD Timestamp: " << GetCFDTimeStamp() << std::endl
00246           << "    CFD Point One: " << GetCFDPointOne() << std::endl
00247           << "    CFD Point Two: " << GetCFDPointTwo() << std::endl
00248           << "    Energy: " << GetEnergy() << std::endl  
00249           << "    LED Crossing is negative: " << IsLEDCrossingNeg() << std::endl  
00250           << "    External Trigger Flag: " << IsExternalTrigFlag() << std::endl  
00251           << "    CFD Crossing Flag: " << IsCFDCrossingFlag() << std::endl  
00252           << "    Pileup Flag: " << IsPileupFlag() << std::endl  
00253           << "    The waveform data has " << GetWaveformLen() 
00254             << " (16-bit) words" << std::endl;
00255 
00256 }
00257 
00258 UInt_t ORGretaDecoder::GetEventWaveformPoint( size_t /*event*/, 
00259                                                      size_t waveformPoint )
00260 {
00261   if ( waveformPoint % 2 == 0 ) {
00262     return GetWaveformDataPointer()[waveformPoint/2] & fBitMask; 
00263   } else {
00264     return ( GetWaveformDataPointer()[waveformPoint/2] & (fBitMask << 16) ) >> 16; 
00265   } 
00266 }
00267 
00268 UInt_t ORGretaDecoder::GetEventFlags( size_t /*event*/ ) 
00269 {
00270   return ((UInt_t)IsLEDCrossingNeg())        |
00271          ((UInt_t)IsExternalTrigFlag()) << 1 |
00272          ((UInt_t)IsCFDCrossingFlag())  << 2 |
00273          ((UInt_t)IsPileupFlag())       << 3;
00274 }
